title: Homemade Bread
steps: Mix flour, salt, yeast. Add water, stir until shaggy dough forms.
Cover, let rise at room temp 12-18 hours.
Turn dough onto floured surface. Fold edges to center, flip seam-side down.
Place on parchment-lined baking sheet. Cover, let rise 1-2 hours.
Preheat oven to 450°F with Dutch oven inside.
Carefully transfer dough to hot Dutch oven. Cover.
Bake covered 30 minutes. Uncover, bake 15-20 more until deep golden.
notes: Dutch oven creates steam for crusty crust.
Cool completely or crumb will be gummy.
